snackbar.server_error: Uuups, there was a server error.

validation.email: Please enter a valid email address.
validation.max_length: Input too long. The max length is {max} characters.
validation.double_check_form: There are some errors in your form data. Please double check your input.

user.name: Name
user.email_exists: There is already an account with this email address.
user.password_empty_info: Leave empty to keep password unchanged.
user.not_found: We were unable to retrieve this user. Try to reload.
user.managed_by_helptext: This group is responsible for managing this user.
user.admin_of_helptext: This user can use the logo of and manage the specified groups, its child groups and its users.
user.roles_loading_failed: Failed to get 'Admin of' and 'User of' info.
user.user_of_helptext: This user can use the logos of the specified groups, but can't change anything.
user.saving_failed: Failed to save user. Try again.
user.remove_confirmation: Do you really want to delete {user}?
user.removing_failed: Failed to delete user. Try again.
user.password_insecure: This password is insecure. Make it longer or ensure it contains numbers and special characters (and lower and uppercase characters of course).

group.name: Name
group.logos_helptext: Members of this group can use the logos listed below.
group.users_helptext: The following users are member of this group.
group.not_found: We were unable to retrieve this group. Try to reload.
group.saving_failed: Failed to save group. Try again.
group.remove_confirmation: Do you really want to delete {group}?
group.removing_failed: Failed to delete group. Try again.
group.no_logos: No logos are associated with this group.
group.no_users: No users are directly associated with this group. But the admins of the parent groups inherit this group.
group.logos_loading_failed: Failed to get logos. Try again.
group.users_loading_failed: Failed to get users. Try again.

create.tooMuchText: Your bars contain too much text. Shorten it!
create.headlineSecondaryAdd: Two magenta headlines are only allowed, if the message requires it and would make less sense otherwise. Click Cancel to insert a second magenta bar. (You have to Click cancel, because people never read the message but just click OK.)
create.selectImage: Click to select image to upload
create.imageTooSmall: The selected image is too small to fill the canvas. Use a bigger one.
create.uploaded_image_not_processable: The uploaded image could not be read.
create.invalid_mime: Only JPEG, PNG and SVG images are supported. Convert the image in one of those formats.
create.border_none: The border is part of the corporate design. You may however omit the border if you use the image in a context where a border looks ugly.
create.uploadFailed: Failed to store image. Please try again.
